about_the_game:
Unleash the Canine Carnage!

WARCANA is going to get an exciting upgrade with our latest DLC, featuring heroic dogs! This expansion pack is perfect for those who think strategy games need a bit more bark and a lot more bite.

What's Inside This Dog-tastic Supporter Pack?

Introducing the Dog of War!
Meet the Dog of War, a steadfast and loyal warrior with a spirit as fierce as Anubis himself. This dog doesn’t rely on brute strength but brings unparalleled determination and a unique flair to your battlefield strategies. It's not about overpowering your enemies – it's about outsmarting them with ancient wisdom.

Warrior's Rest
Give your new canine units a home with the Warrior's Rest. This noble and monumental barracks is the perfect training ground to prepare your Dogs of War for any challenge.

Two New Campaign Missions
Embark on two new campaign missions steeped in the mystique of ancient lands. Challenge your strategic skills and lead your forces through these epic dog-themed scenarios that will test your tactical genius.

Five New Dog-Themed Profile Titles
Celebrate your canine allies with five new profile titles that show your devotion to these noble warriors. From "Leader of the Pack" to "Got that dawg in them", wear your title with pride as you lead your army to victory."

The Hand's New Look
Your advisor, The Hand, has received a makeover inspired by our heroic dogs. Now, every piece of advice comes with a touch of canine wisdom and loyalty."

Why Get This Pack?

This DLC is more than just additional content – it’s a way to support the continued development of WARCANA and ensure we can keep bringing you exciting and creative updates. These new units and features don’t provide game-breaking advantages, but they offer something even more valuable: the chance to outmaneuver your opponents with the cunning and style of legendary dogs."
